resources.string: The hallmark of successful people is that they are always stretching themselves to learn new things. - Carol S. Dweck
Stretching exercises promote flexibility, so you move fluidly. - Denise Austin
You are only as young as your spine is flexible. - Joseph Pilates
Even if you do not have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body. - Erin Heatherton
You were created to excel. Thereâ€™s no limit to how high you can go in life. Keep stretching to the next level. - Joel Osteen
Yoga is the fountain of youth. You are only as young as your spine is flexible. - Bob Harper

Its hard to stay flexible if you do not stretch. I think if you train the right way you will be flexible. There are people that do not appreciate the value of stretching. I think it is very important. - Darren Shahlavi
Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them. - John C. Maxwell
